basic.description: This course provides instruction and practice in effective technical writing and oral presentation. The topics include amongst other things task definition, document structure and outlining. Many of the exercises will be linked to required oral and written communication tasks in other core courses. Open to Geological Engineering students only. (0/0/12/0/0)~ COURSE DELETED IN 2009/10) ~
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Technical Communication I
